item.description:
@BACON555 wrote:

[quote=“agent nukks, post:6, topic:220635”]K

playerIsMember >= 1 || !members){

That si waht your code should look like when finished.

This is the premature code:

[code]playerIsMember >= 0 ||){

If that doesn’t work, try duplicating the code. If that doesn’t work. Ahh well. :s[/code][/quote]
what does that do? im trying to make it so when they log ON it kicks them and logs their name into the member.txt… i could care les bout the ismember crap cuz it automatically changes if ur name is in the member.txt

item.description:
@agent_nukks wrote:

You would have to creat multiple files of “ismember = 1” in your client.java. Search what it says in your character file. If it says “ismember = 0” search it, make it “ismember = 1” and duplicate the code.
